title: Is brand always going to be ignored?
body: he deletes entire teams without even being ahead...power creep is real

replies.body: Shhhhhhhhh. We need some one to kill Yasuo, Tryn, and be able to do something more than tickle Rammus without having to rely on Graves.
you'd have to nerf the damage of every ability to make him balanced, as of right now he just blows everyone up with no risk
i want the stupid q hitbox to be fixed holy shit things huge
I just want the stun projectile speed slowed
